decisions.description: Checks if get records found an oppty of the same type
decisions.name: opptyExist
decisions.label: opptyExist?

decisions.description: Determines Opportunity Type to show correct fields on following screens.
decisions.name: opptyType
decisions.label: opptyType

Flow.description: Screenflow to create a subscription opportunity - Flow checks to see if there is an open opportunity of the same type and prevents the user from entering if so.

formulas.name: closeDateHc
formulas.expression: case(month(today()), 1, addmonths(date(year(today()), 03,31),12), 2, addmonths(date(year(today()), 03,31),12), 3, addmonths(date(year(today()), 03,31),12), 4, addmonths(date(year(today()), 06,30),12), 5, addmonths(date(year(today()), 06,30),12), 6, addmonths(date(year(today()), 06,30),12), 7, addmonths(date(year(today()), 09,30),12), 8, addmonths(date(year(today()), 09,30),12), 9, addmonths(date(year(today()), 09,30),12), 10, addmonths(date(year(today()), 12,31),12), 11, addmonths(date(year(today()), 12,31),12), 12, addmonths(date(year(today()), 12,31),12), null)

formulas.name: formulaOpptyRecordType
formulas.expression: IF({!Select_Opportunity_Type_Ce}='Contractor Subscription','Contractor Subscription', IF({!Select_Opportunity_Type_Hc}='Hiring Client Employer Subscription','Hiring Client Employer Subscription', IF({!Select_Opportunity_Type_Hc}='Hiring Client Subscription','Hiring Client Subscription', IF({!Select_Opportunity_Type_Co}='Contractor Operator Subscription','Hiring Client Subscription',Null))))

formulas.name: formulaOpptyType
formulas.expression: IF({!Select_Opportunity_Type_Ce}='Contractor Subscription','Contractor Subscription', IF({!Select_Opportunity_Type_Hc}='Hiring Client Employer Subscription','Hiring Client Employer Subscription', IF({!Select_Opportunity_Type_Hc}='Hiring Client Subscription','Hiring Client Subscription', IF({!Select_Opportunity_Type_Co}='Contractor Operator Subscription','Contractor Operator Subscription',Null))))

Flow.label: Create Subscription Opportunity

recordLookups.description: Find all open opportunity records related to the account
recordLookups.name: getOpenOpptyRecords
recordLookups.label: getOpenOpptyRecords

value.stringValue: Account must be an active, subscribed contractor account.
Active__c = TRUE AND TYPE = 'Contractor' AND ISNetworld_Status__c = 'Subscriber'

fields.name: feedbackMessage
fields.fieldText: The below details are required if opportunity is being sent to Hiring Clients for feedback.

fields.name: errorMessage
fields.fieldText: Oops! Looks like there was an error. Please contact the Salesforce Admin Team for assistance.

fields.name: opptyExistsMessage
fields.fieldText:
Oops! An open opportunity of this type already exists for this account.


Please work on the existing opportunities instead of creating a new one.

value.stringValue: AccountId = '{!recordId}' AND Active__c = TRUE AND Account_Admin__c = TRUE
Contacts must be associated with account, active and an account admin

fields.name: openMessage
fields.fieldText: Looking to create a new subscription opportunity?

fields.name: openMessageCo
fields.fieldText:
Looking to create a new subscription opportunity?


If this is a Hiring Client (instead of Contractor Operator), you will need to update the Type field on the Account.

fields.name: openMessageHc
fields.fieldText:
Looking to create a new subscription opportunity?


If this is a Contractor Operator (instead of Hiring Client), you will need to update the Type field on the Account.

fields.name: successMessage
fields.fieldText:
Opportunity has been created in a {!stageCe} stage.


Navigate to the opportunities section to view/edit information.

fields.name: successMessage_0
fields.fieldText:
Opportunity has been created in an 00 - New stage.


Navigate to the opportunities section to view/edit information.
